title: Vamana
subtitle: Emetic Therapy
description: Therapeutic vomiting to eliminate Kapha dosha and toxins from the upper body through systematic purification.

title: Virechana
subtitle: Purgation Therapy
description: Therapeutic purgation to eliminate Pitta dosha and purify the liver, gallbladder, and digestive system.

title: Basti
subtitle: Enema Therapy
description: The king of Panchakarma therapies for Vata elimination through medicated enemas, treating neurological disorders.

title: Nasya
subtitle: Nasal Administration
description: Administering medicated oils through the nasal passages to cleanse and rejuvenate the head and neck region.

title: Raktamokshana
subtitle: Bloodletting Therapy
description: A traditional Ayurvedic method of blood purification, used to treat skin diseases, allergies, and infections.
